entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:08 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 5:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 55 %
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: NNW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 near noon then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 5 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
